formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: Events Synopsis: Control Event Flow Privilege: <none> Description: Enable/Disable sending of events to this manager client. Variables: EventMask: 'on' if all events should be sent, 'off' if no events should be sent, 'system,call,log' to select which flags events should have to be sent.
